title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 47-2.4 - Payment of subsidy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 47-2.4 - Payment of subsidy

State Regulations

If a practitioner is a solo practitioner responsible for payment of his/her malpractice insurance premium, such subsidy will be paid directly to the practitioner. If the practitioner is a member of a partnership or professional corporation which is responsible for payment of his/her malpractice insurance premiums, such subsidy will be paid to the partnership or professional corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
47-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
